co.cask.cdap.etl.api

Interface StageContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionContext, BatchActionContext, BatchAggregatorContext, BatchContext, BatchJoinerContext, BatchJoinerRuntimeContext, BatchRuntimeContext, BatchSinkContext, BatchSourceContext, RealtimeContext, SparkExecutionPluginContext, SparkPluginContext, StreamingContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface StageContext
    Context for a pipeline stage, providing access to information about the stage, metrics, and plugins.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StageMetrics getMetrics()
      Get an instance of StageMetrics, used to collect metrics for this stage.
      PluginProperties getPluginProperties()
      Gets the PluginProperties associated with the stage.
      PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
      Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin id.
      String getStageName()
      Gets the unique stage name of the transform, useful for setting the context of logging in transforms.
      <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
      Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given plugin id.
      <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
      Creates a new instance of a plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getStageName

        String getStageName()
        Gets the unique stage name of the transform, useful for setting the context of logging in transforms.
        Returns:
        stage name

      • getMetrics

        StageMetrics getMetrics()
        Get an instance of StageMetrics, used to collect metrics for this stage. Metrics emitted from one stage are independent from metrics emitted in another.
        Returns:
        StageMetrics for collecting metrics

      • getPluginProperties

        PluginProperties getPluginProperties()
        Gets the PluginProperties associated with the stage.
        Returns:
        the PluginProperties.

      • getPluginProperties

        PluginProperties getPluginProperties(String pluginId)
        Gets the PluginProperties associated with the given plugin id.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        the PluginProperties.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin

      • loadPluginClass

        <T> Class<T> loadPluginClass(String pluginId)
        Loads and returns a plugin class as specified by the given plugin id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        the resulting plugin Class.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin

      • newPluginInstance

        <T> T newPluginInstance(String pluginId)
                    throws InstantiationException
        Creates a new instance of a plugin. The instance returned will have the PluginConfig setup with PluginProperties provided at the time when the PluginConfigurer.usePlugin(String, String, String, PluginProperties) was called during the program configuration time.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class type of the plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique identifier provide when declaring plugin usage in the program.
        Returns:
        A new instance of the plugin being specified by the arguments
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - if failed create a new instance
        IllegalArgumentException - if pluginId is not found
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the program does not support plugin
